b109.title: LincRNA-p21 Suppresses Target mRNA Translation
b109.reason: This study provides an example of a lncRNA that binds to and affects the translation of mRNAs

b116.title: Oncogenic Role of Fusion-circRNAs Derived from Cancer-Associated Chromosomal Translocations
b116.reason: This is an important study that reveals that aberrant translocations observed in various types of cancer may generate fusion circRNAs

b135.title: Widespread Shortening of 3′UTRs by Alternative Cleavage and Polyadenylation Activates Oncogenes in Cancer Cells
b135.reason: This is an important study about the 3ʹUTR shortening process in cancer cells as a mechanism to avoid inhibition of oncogenes by mi RNAs
